page.title: 12Places of Worship near sch.
page.content: In the 1km square in which our school was situated we found 14 churches or places where people worship. There were 4 church of England churches(one especially for the deaf and dumb), 2 Baptist churches,1 United Reform church,1 United Pentecostal faith church,1 seventh day Adventist church, 1 Bible Truth Church of God, 1 Light & Life Gospel Fellowship,1 Eighth Church of Christ,1 church of the first born, 1 celeslial church of christ. All these churches are various kinds of christian religions. We found no places where people of other religions can worship. There are a lot of Muslims in our school but there are no mosques to go to in Brixton. They have to travel a long way to worship Allah. Yet a higher proportion of Muslims attend mosques than Christians attend Church.
